name: PEPITA VIAJERA ARCTIC
description:
Pepita Viajera Arctic is an action-adventure platform game whose protagonist is Pepita Viajera. Pepita Viajera travels around the world, she is an adventurer, she loves nature and the people of all continents. She travels on her airplane but sometimes everything doesn't go as expected.

Help Pepita Viajera recover the pieces of her plane, which she lost when she landed unexpectedly in the Arctic. Avoid obstacles and reach the Inushuck in each phase to answer the questions that will help you recover the pieces of the plane and allow Pepita Viajera to continue her journey around the world.
